org.adroitlogic.ultraesb

Class ServerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.ServerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerAdmin

    public class ServerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerAdmin
    This singleton acts as the single point for control of the UltraESB instance

      • stopGracefully

        public void stopGracefully(long gracePeriod)
        Stops the server gracefully within the specified grace period. If the server failed to reach the idle state within the grace period, hard stop at that point
        Specified by:
        stopGracefully in interface ServerAdmin
        Parameters:
        gracePeriod - the maximum time period the stop action will wait for the server to idle after entering the maintenance mode

      • startActingAs

        public void startActingAs(java.lang.String actingNodeName)
        Starts acting as the given server name, which means that all the pinned proxy services to the given node will be started in the current server, unless it also is pinned into the current server.
        Specified by:
        startActingAs in interface ServerAdmin
        Parameters:
        actingNodeName - the name of the server to act as, in addition to self

      • stopActingAs

        public void stopActingAs(java.lang.String actingNodeName)
        Stops acting as the given server name, which means that all the pinned proxy services to the given node will be stopped in the current server, unless it also is pinned into the current server.
        Specified by:
        stopActingAs in interface ServerAdmin
        Parameters:
        actingNodeName - the name of the server to stop acting as

      • scheduleTask

        public void scheduleTask(java.util.TimerTask task,
                long[] timeout)
        Ability to schedule a timer task in the ESB, the variable argument timeout accepts one or two arguments not passing a long value for the variable argument method or passing more than 2 arguments to the variable argument will cause a BusRuntimeException
        Specified by:
        scheduleTask in interface ServerAdmin
        Parameters:
        task - the timer task to be scheduled, this will be wrapped in an internal timer task implementation to make sure none of the tasks are causing the global ESB timer any issues
        timeout - if one argument is provided, it uses the Timer.schedule(java.util.TimerTask, long) method while 2 arguments will invoke the Timer.schedule(java.util.TimerTask, long, long)

      • getMessageInterceptionHandler

        public org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core.interceptor.message.MessageInterceptionHandler getMessageInterceptionHandler()
        Gets the interception handler
        Returns:
        the interception handler registered for this server
